sn47.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati veluvagamake.
sn47.9:1.4: “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, samanta vesaliya yathamittam yathasandittham yathasambhattam vassam upetha.
sn47.9:1.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva samanta vesaliya yathamittam yathasandittham yathasambhattam vassam upagacchum.
sn47.9:1.7: Bhagava pana tattheva veluvagamake vassam upagacchi.
sn47.9:2.1: Atha kho bhagavato vassupagatassa kharo abadho uppajji, balha vedana vattanti maranantika.
sn47.9:2.2: Tatra sudam bhagava sato sampajano adhivasesi avihannamano.
sn47.9:2.4: “na kho me tam patirupam, yoham anamantetva upatthake anapaloketva bhikkhusangham parinibbayeyyam.
sn47.9:2.5: Yannunaham imam abadham viriyena patipanametva jivitasankharam adhitthaya vihareyyan”ti.
sn47.9:2.6: Atha kho bhagava tam abadham viriyena patipanametva jivitasankharam adhitthaya vihasi.
sn47.9:2.7: Atha kho bhagavato so abadho patippassambhi.
sn47.9:3.1: Atha kho bhagava gilana vutthito aciravutthito gelanna vihara nikkhamitva viharapacchayayam pannatte asane nisidi.
sn47.9:3.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn47.9:3.6: Api ca me, bhante, madhurakajato viya kayo, disapi me na pakkhayanti, dhammapi mam nappatibhanti bhagavato gelannena.
sn47.9:3.7: Api ca me, bhante, ahosi kacideva assasamatta:
sn47.9:3.8: ‘na tava bhagava parinibbayissati, na yava bhagava bhikkhusangham arabbha kincideva udaharati’”ti.
sn47.9:4.1: “Kim pana dani, ananda, bhikkhusangho mayi paccasisati?
sn47.9:4.2: Desito, ananda, maya dhammo anantaram abahiram karitva.
sn47.9:4.5: ‘aham bhikkhusangham pariharissami’ti va, ‘mamuddesiko bhikkhusangho’ti va, so nuna, ananda, bhikkhusangham arabbha kincideva udahareyya.
sn47.9:4.6: Tathagatassa kho, ananda, na evam hoti:
sn47.9:4.8: Sa kim, ananda, tathagato bhikkhusangham arabbha kincideva udaharissati.
sn47.9:4.9: Etarahi kho panaham, ananda, jinno vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto.
sn47.9:4.12: evameva kho, ananda, velamissakena manne tathagatassa kayo yapeti.
sn47.9:5.1: Yasmim, ananda, samaye tathagato sabbanimittanam amanasikara ekaccanam vedananam nirodha animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati, phasutaro, ananda, tasmim samaye tathagatassa kayo hoti.
sn47.9:5.2: Tasmatihananda, attadipa viharatha attasarana anannasarana, dhammadipa dhammasarana anannasarana.
sn47.9:6.1: Kathancananda, bhikkhu attadipo viharati attasarano anannasarano, dhammadipo dhammasarano anannasarano?
sn47.9:6.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.9:6.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.9:6.6: Evam kho, ananda, bhikkhu attadipo viharati attasarano anannasarano, dhammadipo dhammasarano anannasarano.
sn47.9:6.7: Ye hi keci, ananda, etarahi va mamaccaye va attadipa viharissanti attasarana anannasarana, dhammadipa dhammasarana anannasarana; tamatagge mete, ananda, bhikkhu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhakama”ti.
